resources.string: President helps members develop as leaders and works to ensure that the club professional and leadership development activities and community and interational service projects are successfully promoted and completed.

Immediate Past President remains on the board the year imediated following their tenure as President to ensure continuity in leadership and act as an advisor to the new President to ensure continuity in leadership and act as an advisor to the new President and board. The IPP serves in this capcity even if they reach the age of 30 during their year as President.

The Club Vice president can serve more effectively by understanding the year goals, projects and activities and being well versed in community and Rotary resources. Also important that the club president and vice president work together as a team.
Secretary handles the club communication with the public through correspondence to the Rotary club sponsor, outside agencies, prospectice members, Rotary International and other Rotaract clubs.

As the collector / disburser of club funds, treasurer is responsible for club solvency an financial stability. In preparing for this assignment,treasurer should meet with the previous treasurer and consult the sponsoring Rotary club treasurer and certified accountant.
